## `rhino` dependencies

#| eval: true

### `rap` dependencies 

`rhino` apps aren't packages, so the dependencies are stored in `rap/dependencies.R`

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| code-fold: true 
#| code-summary: 'show/hide rap dependency tree'
#| collapse: true 
#| comment: "\t"
readLines(con = "_apps/rap/dependencies.R")
```
